|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = PCB on-board |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [[BT Home Hub]] *'''[[BT Home Hub 5A|BT Home Hub 5 (Type A)]]''' - CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80910 (XWAY VRX268) *'''BT Home Hub 5 (Type B)''' - CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63168 @400MHz (BCM63268?) ===Power consumption=== 
Model		BT Home Hub 5A	BT Home Hub 5B
In operation		9.2W		14.0W
Idle			6.3W		7.2W
Standby mode		0.2W		0.1W
